original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena thullanandā bhikkhunī āvasathaṁ anissajjitvā cārikaṁ pakkāmi.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena thullanandā bhikkhunī āvasatham a nissajjitvā cārikam pakkāmi

original: Tena kho pana samayena thullanandāya bhikkhuniyā āvasatho ḍayhati.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena thullanandāya bhikkhuniyāḥ āvasathaḥ ḍayhati

original: Yaṁ kiñci naṭṭhaṁ sabbaṁ amhe abhiyuñjissatī”ti.
analyzed: yam kiñci naṭṭham sabbam amhe abhiyuñjissati iti

original: Thullanandā bhikkhunī punadeva taṁ āvasathaṁ paccāgantvā bhikkhuniyo pucchi—
analyzed: thullanandā bhikkhunī punadeva tam āvasatham paccāgantvā bhikkhuniyaḥ pucchi

original: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo āvasathe ḍayhamāne bhaṇḍakaṁ na nīharissantī”ti.
analyzed: katham hi nāma bhikkhuniyaḥ āvasathe ḍayhamāne bhaṇḍakam na nīharissanti iti

original: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: yāḥ tāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ appicchāḥ pe tāḥ ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti

original: “kathañhi nāma ayyā thullanandā āvasathaṁ anissajjitvā cārikaṁ pakkamissatī”ti …pe…
analyzed: katham hi nāma ayyā thullanandā āvasatham a nissajjitvā cārikam pakkamissati iti pe

original: “saccaṁ kira, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī āvasathaṁ anissajjitvā cārikaṁ pakkamatī”ti?
analyzed: saccam kira bhikkhave thullanandā bhikkhunī āvasatham a nissajjitvā cārikam pakkamati iti

original: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī āvasathaṁ anissajjitvā cārikaṁ pakkamissati.
analyzed: katham hi nāma bhikkhave thullanandā bhikkhunī āvasatham a nissajjitvā cārikam pakkamissati
na ita bhikkhave appasannānam vā pasādāya pe

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddisantu—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave bhikkhuniyaḥ imam sikkhāpadam uddisantu

original: “Yā pana bhikkhunī āvasathaṁ anissajjitvā cārikaṁ pakkameyya, pācittiyan”ti.
analyzed: yā pana bhikkhunī āvasatham a nissajjitvā cārikam pakkameyya pācittiyan ti
pe ayam imasmin atthe adhippetā bhikkhunī iti

original: bhikkhuniyā vā sikkhamānāya vā sāmaṇeriyā vā anissajjitvā parikkhittassa āvasathassa parikkhepaṁ atikkāmentiyā āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: bhikkhuniyā vā sikkhamānāya vā sāmaṇeriyā vā a nissajjitvā parikkhittassa āvasathassa parikkhepam atikkāmentiyā āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Aparikkhittassa āvasathassa upacāraṁ atikkāmentiyā āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: a parikkhittassa āvasathassa upacāram atikkāmentiyāḥ āpatti pācittiyassa
a nissajjite a nissajjita saññā pakkamati āpatti pācittiyassa
a nissajjite vematikā pakkamati āpatti pācittiyassa
a nissajjite nissajjita saññā pakkamati āpatti pācittiyassa
a kavāṭa baddham a nissajjitvā pakkamati āpatti dukkaṭassa
nissajjite a nissajjita saññā āpatti dukkaṭassa
